validators.email: This field must be a valid email address
validators.password: Password must contain at least one uppercase, one lowercase, one special character and one digit and be at least 12 characters long
validators.integer: This field must be an integer
validators.alpha: This field must contain only alphabetic characters
validators.length: This field must be exactly {{length}} characters
validators.alphaDash: This field may only contain alphanumeric characters, dashes and underscores
validators.importExcelFile: File must be an Excel file (.xlsx or .xls) and not exceed 2 MB
